creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in brown ink and pencil: illegible inscription
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over graphite
provenance: [Paul Prouté, Paris, 1993; sold to McCrinde 9/17/93]; Joseph McCrindle, New York, 1993-2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Women Carrying Mortar
